import "../../styles/components/roundchart.css" import { RadialBarChart , RadialBar , ResponsiveContainer , PolarAngleAxis } from "recharts" import { useRef } from "react" function RoundChart ({input}) { let achievement = (input.score)*100 let tab = [{score:achievement,fill:"red"}] return ( Score
{achievement}% de votre
objectif
) } export default RoundChart
